title: LG’s Google Assistant smart display has been beaten with the ugly stick | Trusted Reviews
description: ![LG]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * **Related:[CES 2018](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/ces-2018-live-news-highlights-3350586)**Not a lot is known about the specs, but Google has confirmed the smart displaywill run on the Qualcomm SD624 Home Hub platform.Sony is also working on a smart display with Google Assistant integration, butwe’ve yet to see that model in the flesh.Away from the touchscreen solutions, Altec Lansing, Anker, Bang & Olufsen,Braven, iHome, JBL, Jensen, LG, Klipsch, Knit Audio, Memorex, Riva Audio andSōLIS are all building audio accessories with the Google Assistant at theirheart.Meanwhile Jaybird, JBL, LG and Sony are working on Assistant-poweredheadphones.Google also announced Assistant for Android Auto at CES, while Kia has pledgedto build the tool directly into some of its vehicles.**Has the Google Assistant dominated CES 2018? Drop us a line @TrustedReviewson Twitter.**
